artist: Painter: After Domenichino; Publisher: John Young; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
description: man reclining against large rock, shepherd's crook next to him; sheep in distance; female figure in warrior dress(Ermina), sheild and helmet on ground, standing beside him; putti above rock
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [DOMENICHINO/ London, March 20, 1823, Published by J. Young, 65 Upper Charlotte Street, Fitzroy Square/ and by/ Mss\'rs Hurst, Robinson & Co.go. Cheapside]; on sheet in pencil: 14/ 2-354]
portfolio: From from "Catalog of the Celebrated Collection of Pictures of John Julius Angerstein"
title: Print
